survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Autonomous Vehicle Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights on consumer preferences and concerns regarding features and functionalities in autonomous vehicles.

questions.question_text: Which of the following autonomous vehicle features do you consider most important? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a checkbox format to allow multiple selections. Ensure options are randomized to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE. Randomize answer options.

script.question_text: Which of the following autonomous vehicle features do you consider most important? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to purchase an autonomous vehicle in the next 5 years?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Include a 'Not sure' option if needed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE. Display as radio buttons.

script.question_text: How likely are you to purchase an autonomous vehicle in the next 5 years?

questions.question_text: What is your primary concern about autonomous vehicles?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other (please specify)' option for additional concerns.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary concern about autonomous vehicles?

questions.question_text: In which scenarios would you be most comfortable using an autonomous vehicle? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a checkbox format. Randomize options to minimize order bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE. Randomize answer options.

script.question_text: In which scenarios would you be most comfortable using an autonomous vehicle? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in future autonomous vehicles?
questions.client_notes: Leave this as an open-ended question to capture qualitative insights.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT. Provide a text box for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in future autonomous vehicles?
